document.docAuthor: Peterson, Paul M., Romaschenko, Konstantin, Soreng, Robert J. & Reyna, Jesus Valdes
document.docTitle: Eriocoma arnowiae (S. L. Welsh & N. D. Atwood) Romasch, comb. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A key to the North American genera of Stipeae (Poaceae, Pooideae) with descriptions and taxonomic names for species of Eriocoma, Neotrinia, Oloptum, and five new genera: Barkworthia, x Eriosella, Pseudoeriocoma, Ptilagrostiella, and Thorneochloa

subSubSection.paragraph:
Stipa arnowiae S.L. Welsh & N.D. Atwood, Utah Fl. (ed. 3) 799. 2003 [Basionym] ≡ Achnatherum arnowiae (S.L. Welsh & N.D. Atwood) Barkworth, Sida 22(1): 496. 2006. Type: USA, Utah, Kane Co., T43S, R4W, S13, ca. 9 mi E of Johnson Canyon Jct,, 1740 m, 30 May 2003,

(holotype: BRY; isotypes: GH-00247115 [image!], NY-00887984 [image!], US-3498681!).
